condition.p: When you encounter the following exception: org.openqa.selenium.InvalidElementStateException: invalid element state: Element is not currently interactable and may not be manipulated.

step.cmd: Try one of the following solutions to resolve the issue:
step.info: Wait until the element is visible.

Set a value directly using JavaScript.import com.kms.katalon.core.webui.common.WebUiCommonHelper WebElement element = WebUiCommonHelper.findWebElement(findTestObject('your/object'),30) WebUI.executeJavaScript("arguments[0].value='Your Value'", Arrays.asList(element))
